name: Dotello Endless: Dots Match
description:
The dots just keep on coming.
Swap • Switch • Align • Combine - now endlessly!

The very best of the classic Dotello: the endearing aesthetics, the fan-favourite mechanics, all of the most liked boosters and features - all in one, endless package.

Try your skills - match, align and combine the dots and face the increasingly difficult challenges appearing on the map.

---

Thank you so much for playing Dotello!
Wan't to share a feedback, suggest a new feature or found a bug?
